en.description: The lich will retreat after kneeling down and without stabbing

ru.description: The lich will retreat after kneeling down and without stabbing

ko.description: The lich will retreat after kneeling down and without stabbing

zh-hant.description: 只被擊倒一次不處決就會撤退（默認要被擊倒三次不處決）

zh-hans.description: 只被击倒一次不处决就会撤退（默认要被击倒三次不处决）
